SYSTEM: Fpriyatna-oeg-20141002.pdf: PÃ¡gina 22
IP Problem 
Vertical Approach
1. Normalize mappings in MLite form to M where 
M is in 3rd NF
2. Set Q = trans(P, M) 
o P = SELECT ?s AS ?rdf:subject ?p AS 
?rdf:predicate ?o AS ?rdf:object WHERE 
{ ?s ?p ?o }.
3. Set        = CREATE VIEW rdf:statement AS Q;
4. Set    =
o
Replace rdf:Statement#rdf:subject with rdf:subject
o
Replace rdf:Statement#rdf:predicate with rdf:predicate
o
Replace rdf:Statement#rdf:object with rdf:object
speaker: SYSTEM
